document_name: Integrating Climate change Risks into Water and Flood Management by Vulnerable Mountainous Communities in the Greater Caucasus

outputs.output_descr:
The project aims to achieve following results.
1: Water and flood management framework is modified to respond to adaptation needs and improve climate risk management.
2: Key institutions have capacities, technical skills, tools and methods to apply advanced climate risk management practices for water stress and flood mitigation.
3: Community resilience to floods and water stress improved by introducing locally tailored climate risk management practices.

project_descr: PIMS 3929 SCCF FSP Integrating Climate Change Risks into Water and Flood Management by Vulnerable Mountainous Communities in the Greater Caucasus Region.
